Member Function Documentation

void UsbTransport::Enable (   )  [virtual]
 

Request enabling of the transport (asynchronously).

This method attempts to enable the transport and delivers the result asynchronously by calling OnAvStateChanged().

Implements AbstractTransport.

BOOLEAN UsbTransport::OnMessage (  const Message &  msg  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Every message routed to a dispatcher may be treated in OnMessage.

Returns:
TRUE is returned, if the message has been dispatched.

Implements Dispatcher.
